description:
Weeds out of control? Fill and spray, it's that easy

Replace your complete weed killing system with this pouch and sprayer combo.

Our reusable, easy-fill gallon pouch paired with a premium battery-powered wand sprayer gives you everything you need to apply Sunday weed killer concentrates. This system works with all Sunday concentrate products including Weed Warrior and Dandelion Doom. Whether you need a replacement for lost or damaged components from your starter kit, or want a complete backup system, this combo ensures you're prepared to tackle unwanted weeds whenever they appear.

sections.product_features:
Complete replacement pouch and sprayer system
Reusable 1-gallon concentrate mixing pouch
Battery-powered wand with adjustable spray pattern
Compatible with all Sunday weed killer concentrates
Easy-fill design with secure attachment
Ergonomic grip for comfortable application
Long-lasting performance
sections.whats_included: One (1) reusable weed killer concentrate pouch + One (1) Powerhouse™ battery-powered wand sprayer. Sunday weed killer concentrates sold separately.
sections.instructions:
For best use with your Sunday concentrate products:
Remove the battery pull tab from the sprayer before first use
Pour concentrate into the pouch according to product directions
Fill with water to the 1-gallon mark and secure the cap
Attach wand sprayer to the pouch and shake well to mix
Adjust spray pattern by turning the nozzle tip as needed
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
What Sunday products is this pouch and sprayer compatible with?
This system works with all Sunday weed killer concentrate products including Weed Warrior and Dandelion Doom. The pouch is designed specifically for mixing and applying Sunday weed killer products.
Is this the same system that comes with starter kits?
Yes, this is identical to the pouch and sprayer system included in Sunday Weed Warrior and Dandelion Doom starter kits. It's perfect if you need to replace components or want a complete backup system.
How many applications can I get from one pouch?
The pouch is reusable and designed to be rinsed and refilled for multiple applications. With proper care, it can be used for many seasons of weed control.
Can I buy just the pouch or just the sprayer separately?
Yes, the Universal Wand Sprayer is available separately if you only need to replace the sprayer portion of your system.
How do I clean the pouch and sprayer after use?
After each use, rinse both the pouch and sprayer thoroughly with clean water. Fill the pouch partially with clean water, reattach the sprayer, and spray for 30 seconds to clean internal components. Allow to dry before storing in a cool, dry place.
